name: vega-lite
author: Jeffrey Heer, Dominik Moritz, Kanit "Ham" Wongsuphasawat
description: Vega-lite provides a higher-level grammar for visual analysis, comparable to ggplot or Tableau, that generates complete Vega specifications.

scripts.build: browserify src/vl.ts -p tsify -d -s vl | exorcist vega-lite.js.map > vega-lite.js
scripts.postbuild: uglifyjs vega-lite.js -cm --source-map vega-lite.min.js.map > vega-lite.min.js && npm run schema
scripts.build:all: npm run clean && npm run data && npm run build && npm test && npm run lint && npm run build:images
scripts.cover: npm run pretest && istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --recursive
scripts.clean: rm -f vega-lite.* vega-lite-schema.json & find src -name '*.js*' -type f -delete & find test -name '*.js*' -type f -delete & find site -name '*.js*' -type f -delete & rm -rf examples/_diff examples/_original examples/_output examples/images && rm -rf data
scripts.prestart: npm run build && npm run data && scripts/index-examples
scripts.presite: tsc && npm run build && bower install && npm run data && npm run build:toc
scripts.test: npm run schema && mocha --recursive --require source-map-support/register test examples
scripts.test:debug: npm run schema && mocha --debug-brk --recursive --require source-map-support/register test examples
scripts.watch:build: watchify src/vl.ts -p tsify -v -d -s vl -o 'exorcist vega-lite.js.map > vega-lite.js'
scripts.watch: nodemon -x 'npm run build && npm test && npm run lint'
